thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: mrsmc1234
title: Excellent hotel
text: Stayed here for 3 nights bed & breakfast room was very nice all facilities very good including free water in fridge. The breakfast was very good. The hotel has a restaurant at night very reasonable prices good choices and very generous portions. There was a room where you could heat up your own food free laundry facilities gym & free sauna never seen this before in any other hotel. The staff were very friendly & helpful. Would definitely stay again
